oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Andrew Jackson portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gen. Andrew Jackson (1767-1845) astride his horse on field of battle, War of 1812. The horse wears a sadle and triangular blanket, with one leg raised. Jackson is in uniform. American flag in background. Includes facsimile signature.
Jackson served as Major General of the Tennessee Militia and Major General of the U.S. Army during the War of 1812.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845. Works. 1986;Southern States--History--War of 1812
Presidents;Generals;Horses;Uniforms;Military
